title: Assessment Severity Definitions
description: Shared severity definitions for assessment and analysis tooling.
$comment: Implementations MUST compare severities using severityLevel, not lexical ordering of severityName.

severityName.description: Assessment severity name from lowest (info) to highest (critical).

severityLevel.description: Numeric severity level for sorting and comparison (info=0, critical=4).

severityMapping.description: Canonical mapping of severity names to numeric levels.
